title: Not seeing level 6 token for some reason
body: I am level 5 with Draven and I have scored several s and s+ ranks, but it doesn't say I got a token anywhere. Also it was on normal summoner rift.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it appears you have 2 mastery 6 tokens for Draven already. You simply need to go into Hextech Crafting so you can forge them and reach level 6 mastery and start earning level 7 tokens. Check out our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) for additional information.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Did you get a message in the lobby saying you received one? Tokens are found in your Hextech crafting at the bottom under the Materials section (just in case you weren't sure where they show).

Have you been punished (chat or account restriction) at any time? If so, you may be temporarily ineligible for Hextech loot, which includes Mastery tokens.
